lib.name: strings
lib.text: You enjoy a peaceful walk in the deepwoods. It gives you time to think over the recent, disturbing events. BuffOrRecover('tou',5,'deepwoods/walk','Deepwoods walk',36,2) BuffOrRecover('int',10,'deepwoods/walk','Deepwoods walk',36,2)

armor.name: green adventurer's clothes
armor.long: a green adventurer's outfit, complete with pointed cap
armor.description: A set of comfortable green adventurer's clothes. It even comes complete with a pointy hat!

armor.name: apprentice's robe
armor.description: This drab robe lacks adornment, yet retains an air of mysticality. The low quality of the fabric coupled with its mystic air suggests that it is a garment meant for mages in training.

armor.name: arcane bangles
armor.description: Silver bangles to be worn from the wrists and ankles, inscribed with arcane runes. For some reason, you feel like wearing these with armor or clothes is somehow wrong.

armor.name: long ballroom dress patterned with sequins
armor.long: a ballroom dress patterned with sequins
armor.description: A long ballroom dress patterned with sequins. Perfect for important occasions.

armor.name: bimbo skirt
armor.long: a skirt that looks like it belongs on a bimbo
armor.description: A tight, cleavage-inducing halter top and an extremely short miniskirt. The sexual allure of this item is undoubtable.

armor.name: blue kimono
armor.description: This lovely blue kimono is adorned with a floral pattern. It will likely increase your spiritual power as a kitsune.

armor.name: barely-decent bondage straps
armor.description: These leather straps and well-placed hooks are actually designed in such a way as to be worn as clothing. While they technically would cover your naughty bits, virtually every other inch of your body would be exposed.

armor.name: comfortable clothes
armor.description: These loose fitting and comfortable clothes allow you to move freely while protecting you from the elements.

armor.name: revealing chainmail bikini
armor.description: A revealing chainmail bikini that barely covers anything. The bottom half is little more than a triangle of metal and a leather thong.

armor.name: classy suitclothes
armor.description: A set of classy suitclothes.

armor.name: dragonscale armor
armor.description: This armor is cleverly fashioned from dragon scales. It offers high protection while at the same time, quite flexible.

armor.name: dragonscale robes
armor.description: This robe is expertly made from dragon scales. It offers high protection while being lightweight and should be comfortable to wear all day.

armor.name: Ebonweave Heretic‘s Garb
armor.description: This outfit is ebonweave, created using refined ebonbloom petals. The outfit consists of arrowproof clothes, covered by a mesh breastplate and leatherlike duster inscribed with glyphs of magic and warding. A trilby adorned with a moon pin completes the look.

armor.name: ebonweave jacket
armor.description: This outfit is ebonweave, created using refined ebonbloom petals. The outfit consists of a leatherlike jacket, a mesh breastplate and a set of arrowproof clothing. Between them all, the outfit provide layers of protection rivaling heavier, more traditional armor.

armor.name: ebonweave platemail
armor.description: The armor is ebonweave, created using refined ebonbloom petals. The armor consists of two layers, an outer layer of ebonweave playing, and an inner layer of arrowproof ebonweave cloth.

armor.name: ebonweave robe
armor.description: This robe is ebonweave, created using refined ebonbloom petals. This robe is as comfortable as cloth yet more protective than chainmail. The cloth has a mystic aura, helpful when working magic.

armor.name: full-body chainmail
armor.long: a full suit of chainmail armor
armor.description: This full suit of chainmail armor covers its wearer from head to toe in protective steel rings.

armor.name: full platemail
armor.description: A highly protective suit of steel platemail. It would be hard to find better physical protection than this.

armor.name: glistening gel-armor plates
armor.description: This suit of interlocking plates is made from a strange green material. It feels spongy to the touch but is amazingly resiliant.

armor.name: Heretic‘s Garb
armor.description: Weathered traveling clothes, covered by a duster. Wards and arcane glyphs inscribed in the duster facilitates magic while providing significant defense. A feather tipped trilby completes the look.

armor.name: practically indecent steel armor
armor.long: a suit of practically indecent steel armor
armor.description: This suit of steel 'armor' has two round disks that barely cover the nipples, a tight chainmail bikini, and circular butt-plates.

armor.name: indecent dragonscale robe
armor.description: More of a longcoat than a robe, this outfit is crafted from dragon scales. Discrete straps centered around the belt keep the front perpetually open, displaying your groin and any cleavage you might have. The dragonscale is treated to be durable yet remain comfortable.

armor.name: indecent ebonweave robe
armor.description: More of a longcoat than a robe, this outfit is crafted from refined ebonbloom petals. Discrete straps centered around the belt keep the front perpetually open, displaying your groin and any cleavage you might have. The cloth has a mystic aura, helpful when working magic.

armor.name: indecent spider silk robe
armor.description: More of a longcoat than a robe, this outfit is crafted from alchemically treated spider silk. Discrete straps centered around the belt keep the front perpetually open, displaying your groin and any cleavage you might have.

armor.name: leather armor segments
armor.description: This is a suit of well-made leather armor. It looks fairly rugged.

armor.name: white silk shirt and tight leather pants
armor.long: a pair of leather pants and a white silk shirt
armor.description: A flowing silk shirt and tight black leather pants. Suave!

armor.name: black leather armor surrounded by voluminous robes
armor.long: a suit of black leather armor with voluminous robes
armor.description: This is a suit of flexible leather armor with a voluminous set of concealing black robes.

armor.name: modest robes
armor.description: A set of modest robes, not dissimilar from what the monks back home would wear.

armor.name: skimpy nurse's outfit
armor.description: This borderline obscene nurse's outfit would barely cover your hips and crotch. The midriff is totally exposed, and the white top leaves plenty of room for cleavage. A tiny white hat tops off the whole ensemble. It would grant a small regeneration to your HP.

armor.name: white shirt and overalls
armor.description: A simple white shirt and overalls.

armor.name: purple kimono
armor.description: This lovely purple kimono is adorned with a floral pattern. It will likely increase your spiritual power as a kitsune.

armor.name: red, high-society bodysuit
armor.long: a red bodysuit for high society
armor.description: A high society bodysuit. It is as easy to mistake it for ballroom apparel as it is for boudoir lingerie. The thin transparent fabric is so light and airy that it makes avoiding blows a second nature.

armor.name: rubber fetish clothes
armor.long: a set of revealing rubber fetish clothes
armor.description: A revealing set of fetish-wear. Upgrades your tease attack with the "Slutty Seduction" perk.

armor.name: red kimono
armor.description: This lovely red kimono is adorned with a floral pattern. It will likely increase your spiritual power as a kitsune.

armor.name: samurai armor
armor.description: This suit of armor is originally worn by the Samurai, the warriors from the far East.

armor.name: scale-mail armor
armor.description: This suit of scale-mail covers the entire body with layered steel scales, providing flexibility and protection.

armor.name: spider-silk robes
armor.description: This robe looks incredibly comfortable. It's made from alchemically enhanced spider-silk, and embroidered with what looks like magical glyphs around the sleeves and hood.

armor.name: spider-silk armor
armor.description: This armor is as white as the driven snow. It's crafted out of thousands of strands of spider-silk into an impenetrable protective suit. The surface is slightly spongy, but so tough you wager most blows would bounce right off.

armor.name: semi-transparent bodysuit
armor.description: A semi-transparent bodysuit. It looks like it will cling to all the curves of your body.

armor.name: training soul armor
armor.description: This set of heavy armor is made using soulmetal but it main purpose is to allow user train ki to the uttermost limit for novice soul cultivator.

armor.name: tube top and short shorts
armor.long: a snug tube top and VERY short shorts
armor.description: A clingy tube top and VERY short shorts.

armor.name: wizard's robes
armor.description: These robes appear to have once belonged to a female wizard. They're long with a slit up the side and full billowing sleeves. The top is surprisingly low cut. Somehow you know wearing it would aid your spellcasting.

armor.name: white kimono
armor.description: This lovely white kimono is adorned with a floral pattern. It will likely increase your spiritual power as a kitsune.
